body: At 13th level, if an unarmed fighter confirms a critical hit with his unarmed strike or begins his turn grappled, he may attempt a dirty trick maneuver to blind his target as a swift action that does not provoke attacks of opportunity. A target more than one size category larger is unaffected. This ability replaces weapon training 3.
name: Eye Gouge
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Fighter/Fighter Archetypes/Unarmed Fighter/Eye Gouge
